result.eng: It happened at the end of the last century.
result.ga: Tharla sé ag deireadh an chéid seo caite
result.orig: Tharla sé ag deireadh an chéid seo caite
result.html: Tharla sé ag deireadh an chéid seo caiteIt happened at the end of the last century.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla sé ag deireaḋ an ċéid seo caiteIt happened at the end of the last century.

result.eng: Am I the last person?
result.ga: An mise an duine deireanach
result.orig: An mise an duine deireanach
result.html: An mise an duine deireanachAm I the last person?
result.ponchtml: An mise an duine deireanaċAm I the last person?

result.eng: Did you go out last night?
result.ga: An raibh tú amuigh aréir
result.orig: An raibh tú amuigh aréir
result.html: An raibh tú amuigh aréirDid you go out last night?
result.ponchtml: An raiḃ tú amuiġ aréirDid you go out last night?

result.eng: Communism was on its last legs in 1989.
result.ga: Bhí an cumannachas ar an dé deiridh i 1989
result.orig: Bhí an cumannachas ar an dé deiridh i 1989
result.html: Bhí an cumannachas ar an dé deiridh i 1989Communism was on its last legs in 1989.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an cumannaċas ar an dé deiriḋ i 1989Communism was on its last legs in 1989.

result.eng: I had a dream last night.
result.ga: Bhí brionglóid agam aréir
result.orig: Bhí brionglóid agam aréir
result.html: Bhí brionglóid agam aréirI had a dream last night.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí brionglóid agam aréirI had a dream last night.

result.eng: They were still working at this time last year.
result.ga: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caite
result.orig: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caite
result.html: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caiteThey were still working at this time last year.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an ḃliain seo caiteThey were still working at this time last year.

result.eng: There was a big crowd in the pub last night.
result.ga: Bhí slua mór sa tábhairne aréir
result.orig: Bhí slua mór sa tábhairne aréir
result.html: Bhí slua mór sa tábhairne aréirThere was a big crowd in the pub last night.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí slua mór sa táḃairne aréirThere was a big crowd in the pub last night.

result.eng: It rained last night.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag cur fearthainne aréir
result.orig: Bhí sé ag cur fearthainne aréir
result.html: Bhí sé ag cur fearthainne aréirIt rained last night.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag cur fearṫainne aréirIt rained last night.

result.eng: The project was finished at long last in 2004.
result.ga: Críochnaíodh an tionscadal faoi dheireadh thiar thall sa bhliain 2004
result.orig: Críochnaíodh an tionscadal faoi dheireadh thiar thall sa bhliain 2004
result.html: Críochnaíodh an tionscadal faoi dheireadh thiar thall sa bhliain 2004The project was finished at long last in 2004.
result.ponchtml: Críoċnaíoḋ an tionscadal faoi ḋeireaḋ ṫiar ṫall sa ḃliain 2004The project was finished at long last in 2004.

result.eng: It was published last year.
result.ga: Foilsíodh an bhliain seo caite é
result.orig: Foilsíodh an bhliain seo caite é
result.html: Foilsíodh an bhliain seo caite éIt was published last year.
result.ponchtml: Foilsíoḋ an ḃliain seo caite éIt was published last year.

result.eng: I wasn't here last week because I was ill.
result.ga: Ní raibh mé anseo an tseachtain seo caite mar bhí mé tinn
result.orig: Ní raibh mé anseo an tseachtain seo caite mar bhí mé tinn
result.html: Ní raibh mé anseo an tseachtain seo caite mar bhí mé tinnI wasn't here last week because I was ill.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ mé anseo an tseaċtain seo caite mar ḃí mé tinnI wasn't here last week because I was ill.

result.eng: This is the last one.
result.ga: Seo é an ceann deireanach
result.orig: Seo é an ceann deireanach
result.html: Seo é an ceann deireanachThis is the last one.
result.ponchtml: Seo é an ceann deireanaċThis is the last one.

result.eng: The poor old woman is on her last legs.
result.ga: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridh
result.orig: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridh
result.html: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridhThe poor old woman is on her last legs.
result.ponchtml: Tá an tseanḃean ḃoċt ar an dé deiriḋThe poor old woman is on her last legs.

result.eng: There will be a special edition, the last show of the season.
result.ga: Eagrán ar leith a bheas ann seó deireanach an tséasúir
result.orig: Eagrán ar leith a bheas ann seó deireanach an tséasúir
result.html: Eagrán ar leith a bheas ann seó deireanach an tséasúirThere will be a special edition, the last show of the season.
result.ponchtml: Eagrán ar leiṫ a ḃeas ann seó deireanaċ an tséasúirThere will be a special edition, the last show of the season.

result.eng: Her husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.
result.ga: Cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht Dé leis
result.orig: Cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht Dé leis
result.html: Cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht Dé leisHer husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.
result.ponchtml: Cailleaḋ a fear céile go tobann anuraiḋ beannaċt Dé leisHer husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.

result.eng: I went to a play the night before last.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé chuig dráma arú aréir
result.orig: Chuaigh mé chuig dráma arú aréir
result.html: Chuaigh mé chuig dráma arú aréirI went to a play the night before last.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé ċuig dráma arú aréirI went to a play the night before last.

result.eng: I went to County Kerry last year on my holiday.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé go Contae Chiarraí an bhliain seo caite ar mo laethanta saoire
result.orig: Chuaigh mé go Contae Chiarraí an bhliain seo caite ar mo laethanta saoire
result.html: Chuaigh mé go Contae Chiarraí an bhliain seo caite ar mo laethanta saoireI went to County Kerry last year on my holiday.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé go Contae Ċiarraí an ḃliain seo caite ar mo laeṫanta saoireI went to County Kerry last year on my holiday.

result.eng: Rome is lovely. I was there last year.
result.ga: Tá an Róimh go hálainn Bhí mé ansin anuraidh
result.orig: Tá an Róimh go hálainn Bhí mé ansin anuraidh
result.html: Tá an Róimh go hálainn Bhí mé ansin anuraidhRome is lovely. I was there last year.
result.ponchtml: Tá an Róiṁ go hálainn Ḃí mé ansin anuraiḋRome is lovely. I was there last year.

result.eng: This was the last operation of its kind we will see.
result.ga: Ba é seo an obráid dheireanach dá cineál a fheicfidh muid
result.orig: Ba é seo an obráid dheireanach dá cineál a fheicfidh muid
result.html: Ba é seo an obráid dheireanach dá cineál a fheicfidh muidThis was the last operation of its kind we will see.
result.ponchtml: Ba é seo an obráid ḋeireanaċ dá cineál a ḟeicfiḋ muidThis was the last operation of its kind we will see.

result.eng: On my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
result.ga: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga
result.orig: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga
result.html: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorgaOn my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
result.ponchtml: Ar mo ḃealaċ ar ais as Éirinn an ṁí seo caite rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorgaOn my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.

result.eng: Here in New York we had a small earthquake last week.

result.orig: Anseo i Nua-Eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caite

result.eng: That was the last I saw of them.
result.ga: Ba é sin an t-amharc deireanach a fuair mé orthu

result.html: Ba é sin an t-amharc deireanach a fuair mé orthuThat was the last I saw of them.
